```{r}
library(dplyr, quietly = TRUE)

data(mtcars)
head(mtcars, 4)
```


```{r}
per_cyl <- mtcars %>%
    group_by(cyl) %>%
    summarise(disp.avg    = mean(cyl),
              carb.max    = max(carb))

per_cyl
```

Et cela donne graphiquement pour les `r nrow(mtcars)` voitures:

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

mtcars <- mtcars %>%
  mutate(cyl = as.factor(cyl))

print(qplot(cyl, mpg, data = mtcars, geom = "boxplot"))
```
